alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Tarrant (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 26 at 8:38AM CDT until October 27 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Texas... West Fork Trinity River At Grand Prairie affecting Dallas and Tarrant Counties. ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River At Dallas affecting Dallas County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...West Fork Trinity River at Grand Prairie. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 27.0 feet, Minor flooding of lowland areas may occur near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 AM CDT Thursday the stage was 21.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 27.0 feet. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 27.8 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
